ygData.subject: Re: Road to Ruin
ygData.msgSnippet: The firepower of the war in the CF and the tremors caused by the strugeling gestalts hides the loud sound of the power that drives Motormaster, as he breaks

The firepower of the war in the CF and the tremors caused by the 
strugeling gestalts hides the loud sound of the power that drives 
Motormaster, as he breaks through the forest towards the CF, leading 
Drag Strip, Dead-End and Speedbreaker. He stops behind a hill, to give 
him cover fire from anything, and transforms, flexing his large arms, 
then ajusts his gun. "Lets rip this place up Stunticons" his doom 
filled voice echoes, as he leans onto the hill, and plants his Cyclone 
gun down, waiting for more to arrive. "Triggerhappy and Skullgrin come 
to our positions" he commands.

Speedbreaker follows transforming, and getting beside Motormaster. He 
also plants down, and waites.
